text: my job is to build large-scale machine
learning applications and models
infrastructure to help us deliver the
most relevant and engaging ad experience
to amazon shoppers our system is hosting
a few hundreds of different deep
learning models the biggest challenge
for us is how to build ultra low latency
and high throughput deep learning
influencing services while keeping our
hardware cost under control we build
micro service influencing services on
top of amazon ecs
and the app mesh
so that we can scale to a few hundred of
models each will have unique hardware
and software combination for
optimization strategies aws offers a
wide selection of options for us to
optimize machine learning across the
full stack
for example we can choose different
model servers such as nvidia treatment
or siege maker multi-model server for
different application use cases that can
meet our latency and throughput
requirements it offers all the different
tools an option for us to offload heavy
lifting work so we can manage and focus
more on the science innovation by
managing the lower level engineering and
the infrastructure we are able to
improve our shoppers engagement on ads
as measured by clicks and purchases by
double digit over the last two years and
as a result we further drive the double
digit improvement of the error hazard
return on investment and so we can
deliver a more relevant ads to shoppers
and better return for our ad hazard
customers
